  • Procedurally generated underground worlds with various ore types and mining tiers

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players dig through procedurally generated underground worlds, collect resources, and upgrade their equipment. The game features real-time multiplayer interaction, a shop system for purchasing upgrades and consumables, and both mobile and desktop controls. Players can save their progress locally or sync to the cloud, and the game includes a dynamic day-night cycle and various ore types with different mining tiers.
